channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch The Beta Band Reunite For First Show In 21 Years
item.description: 🎉 The Beta Band is back and better than ever! 🎶 Who's ready to rock out with them after 21 years?! 🤘 #BetaBandReunion

item.title: John Lennon’s Famed ‘Lost Weekend’ Glasses Expected to Sell for $400,000 at Auction
item.description: 🕶️ John Lennon's iconic 'Lost Weekend' glasses up for grabs! Who's ready to bid and rock this piece of music history? 💸 #JohnLennon #MusicMemorabilia

item.title: FKA twigs Confirms Eusexua Afterglow Release Date, Shares Video for New Song “Cheap Hotel”: Watch
item.description: 🔥 FKA twigs drops release date and visuals for “Cheap Hotel”! 🎶 Dive into the Eusexua Afterglow world now! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Brian May: Queen Are “Having Conversations” About Sphere Residency
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends Queen are eyeing a Sphere residency! 🔮 Who else is ready for this epic experience? 🤩 #Queen #BrianMay #MusicNews

item.title: Stagecoach Reveals 2026 Lineup with Post Malone, Lainey Wilson, and Journey: How to Get Tickets
item.description: YEEHAW! 🌟 Stagecoach just dropped their 2026 lineup featuring Post Malone, Lainey Wilson, and Journey! 🎶 Who's joining the party? #Stagecoach2026
